dataFeedElement.name: Amrutha Sympathises With Rudra
dataFeedElement.description: Amrutha is devastated to see Rudra's condition. Renuka informs Jayanthi that she revealed her secrets to Rudra! How will Jayanthi react to this? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Ambika Learns Nisha's Truth
dataFeedElement.description: An irritated Rithik berates Gaurav when he visits the house. Elsewhere, Ambika slaps Nisha after learning about her plan.

dataFeedElement.name: Arjo Meets with an Accident
dataFeedElement.description: Bhanu vows in front of Jhumpa to find out the truth behind Sheuli's death. Elsewhere, the Mullicks are baffled when Arjo meets with an accident.

dataFeedElement.name: Dadasaheb emphasises a united family
dataFeedElement.description: Rohit asks Rajlaxmi why she slapped Rupali and Pooja. Rajlaxmi explains that they have stolen her credit card, and throws Pooja out of the house. Rupali tries to instigate Kalyani against Rajlaxmi. Dadasaheb stresses the importance of a united family. But will his family members listen to him?

dataFeedElement.name: Madan's Wife's Greedy Demands
dataFeedElement.description: Madan's wife agrees to let him take part in Prafulla's wedding rituals but on a condition. Will Prafulla reach the wedding venue in time?

dataFeedElement.name: Rajeev Nigam's sensational act
dataFeedElement.description: Parizaad welcomes judges Shekar Suman and Navjot Singh Sidhu to the show. Rajeev Nigam, Rajendra Malviya, Aslam Imran and Papa CJ put on wonderful performances. Later, the judges declare Rajeev Nigam as the winner of the episode.

dataFeedElement.name: Priya Attempts Suicide?
dataFeedElement.description: An emotional Priya tries to commit suicide having lost all faith. Later, Subbu beats Raja to pulp after learning about Priya's pregnancy.

dataFeedElement.name: Nandni Is Attacked
dataFeedElement.description: Amatya attacks Nandni and succeeds in abducting Bindusara. Will Chandragupta and Nandni be able to rescue Bindusara? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Will Deb Deceive His Family?
dataFeedElement.description: Tandra, Palak and Deb plan to spoil the Senguptas' image in front of Topu's family. Will Deb's plan be revealed? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Sehgal Suspects Yug, Amrit
dataFeedElement.description: Sehgal learns about Nimrit’s loyalty towards Agam. Later, he suspects Yug and Amrit's motive. Will he find out the truth? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Balaraju's Promise to Savitri
dataFeedElement.description: Venkat Rao vows to create differences between Rama Rao and Nageshwar Rao. Later, Savitri seeks a promise from Balaraju.

dataFeedElement.name: Surya Ignores Sandhya
dataFeedElement.description: Meenakshi's mother instructs her to take charge of the household. Meanwhile, Yemi's mother instigates her against Meenakshi. Later, Sandhya gets disheartened when Surya ignores her.

dataFeedElement.name: Sivadasan Versus Global Warming
dataFeedElement.description: Sivadasan suffers because of the scorching heat. He gets a heat stroke and faints. When an air conditioner salesman visits to sell the last air conditioner unit, the two families fight to claim the much-needed appliance.

dataFeedElement.name: Automation Test Episode for API Test of replication
dataFeedElement.description: This is an episode for API Automation test for replication of episode from one tenant to another

dataFeedElement.name: Vishwas Meets Vidhi
dataFeedElement.description: Kavya calls Nikhil to her flat while Vishwas confides in Vidhi after his failed attempt. Later, Nikhil warns Kavya about her reckless behaviour.

dataFeedElement.name: Paridhi's failure
dataFeedElement.description: Radha is on a spying and prying spree. Meanwhile, Kokila refuses to accept Paridhi. Kokila tells Gopi that she should stop praising Paridhi in her presence. Paridhi takes up a few responsibilities, but fails at accomplishing them. Will she impress the family members and win their trust?

dataFeedElement.name: Pooja attempts suicide
dataFeedElement.description: An infuriated Vishwasrao refuses to get Pooja married to Niranjan as they fail to complete the task assigned to them successfully. An upset Pooja attempts to commit suicide. On Durva's request, Vishwasrao gives Pooja and Niranjan another chance. Will they be able to succeed in the task this time?

dataFeedElement.name: The Doctor Advises Seetha
dataFeedElement.description: The doctor advises Seetha on ways to deal with the family, while Rajeshwari waits for the assassin to make his move.

dataFeedElement.name: What's Bothering Adi?
dataFeedElement.description: Santosh gets worried as Madhavi gets tipsy after one drink. Raman tries to clear Mani’s doubts about Aditya. But, why is Aditya stressed? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Ayush's family in a soup
dataFeedElement.description: Ayush's family struggles to manage the situation as Tutul's family wants to know about Madhu's presence in the house. Meanwhile, Kuheli informs Deep that Madhu is unwell. On Aporupa's insistence, Madhu's family gets her admitted to a hospital.

dataFeedElement.name: Dilip receives Samaira's call
dataFeedElement.description: Radhika eagerly waits for Samaira's call while Arjun rescues Samaira from a dog. Dilip receives a call from Ankush's friend who imitates Samaira’s voice and confirms about the job. Dadaji asks Ankush to retrieve the paper he threw, which has the company's name on it.

dataFeedElement.name: Amar's Furious Act
dataFeedElement.description: Ramesh Chandra and Sameer feel elated as Kokila returns home. Later, Amar creates a scene at Manoj's house.

dataFeedElement.name: Kokila and Gopi rescue Meera
dataFeedElement.description: Gopi sees Meera trapped under a cupboard. Kokila and Gopi take her to the hospital. Meanwhile, Gopi tries to inform Ahem about her pregnancy, but in vain. The Modi family decide to visit Kuldevi's temple. Radha plans to kill Meera, on the way to the temple.

dataFeedElement.name: Indra Accuses Mahadeva
dataFeedElement.description: Mahadeva appears before Andaka while all the Devas plead Parvati to stop Andaka. How will Parvati react with Indra for accusing Mahadeva. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Tushu Is depressed
dataFeedElement.description: Geeta buys a necklace for Munni and asks Kushan to put it on her neck. When Tushu is depressed, Aditi gifts her own jewellery, and hands over the property papers to her. Meanwhile, Amon wishes to take Bhadu for an English movie, but she refuses to go. What is Kartik up to in their house, meanwhile?

dataFeedElement.name: Hatim confronts the  witches
dataFeedElement.description: To save young village girls from being captured by the witches, Perizaad baits herself to reach the witches' layer. The village head tells Hatim how to destroy them. But will Hatim be able to get there before the witches hurt Perizaad?

dataFeedElement.name: Duryodhana attempts suicide
dataFeedElement.description: Draupadi's remark hurts Duryodhana so much that he tries to commit suicide. He can only think of avenging his insult by humiliating the Pandavas. He apologises to Shakuni for insulting him earlier and asks Karna to attack Indraprastha.

dataFeedElement.name: Shriya To Confess Her Feelings
dataFeedElement.description: Shriya plans to convey her feelings to Shivaram. Sarla is unhappy with the birthday gifts from Raghav's family. She seeks the consent of Shriya's father to get her married to Sarath. Will Shanti approve Shriya's proposal?

dataFeedElement.name: Sharan seeks Lakshmi's support
dataFeedElement.description: Anand is arrested by the Cyber Cell police. Sharan requests Lakshmi to support him at the court so that he can win Malu's custody. Sharan frees Anand from the prison by using his influence. But, Lakshmi is set on getting him jailed. Meanwhile, Mr. Menon asks Mr. Iyer to get Lakshmi and Sharan ma...

dataFeedElement.name: Kalyaan Back To Normal
dataFeedElement.description: Lakshmi expresses her love to Kalyaan. Everyone rejoices when Kalyaan recovers. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Vanitha Gets Back at Priya
dataFeedElement.description: Chitradevi praises Seetha and feels confident about her ability. Seetha hides the truth about the abortion and assures Ram of the family's approval. Later, Vanitha gets back at Priya by threatening to reveal her secrets.

dataFeedElement.name: Divya fighting for her life
dataFeedElement.description: Divya meets Prasanthan and tells him to end the marriage. At the hospital, Veni begs Indiran to let her go, but he refuses. Meanwhile, Divya visits the Palat House to see her child but Sethulakshmi kicks her out of the house. Later, she learns that her health condition is getting critical by the...

dataFeedElement.name: Kavya Saves the Day
dataFeedElement.description: Kavya finds a way to reach Kalakshetram. Later, Chinni and Seetharamaiah feel elated when Kavya saves the day with the help of the police.

dataFeedElement.name: Talented Celebs
dataFeedElement.description: Watch the celebrities cook and sing during the lockdown to beat their boredom. Tune in for loads of fun!

dataFeedElement.name: Ram is concerned about the plan
dataFeedElement.description: Kunjappu suffers and decides to return to his village. Ram strives hard to make Pooja believe in Balaganapathy. He is concerned about Kunjappu's new plan. Sunanda warns Ram and Balaganapathy about a problem. Kichammayi arrives at Ram's house. What is the problem?

dataFeedElement.name: Sisters in Crime!
dataFeedElement.description: Ria and her sister, Piya take advantage of Parth for their financial gain. Later, Parth learns something shocking about the sisters.

dataFeedElement.name: Comedians in Disguise
dataFeedElement.description: The in-house comedians of Vijay TV disguise themselves as women to take part in some fun-filled and exciting set of games.

dataFeedElement.name: Vithal Meets Janudev
dataFeedElement.description: While Pundalik gets ready to face his ultimate test, Rukmini determines not to let Vithal help him. Vithal appears before Janudev, only to make him have faith in his existence.

dataFeedElement.name: Mind-blowing Shock for Roshini
dataFeedElement.description: ACP Roshini interrogates Mounitha and finds some important clues against her. Later, she gets shocked after seeing an important person related to the murder case. Who is it?

dataFeedElement.name: Mahadev is pacified
dataFeedElement.description: Lord Vishnu and Parvati succeed in pacifying Mahadev. Mahadev gets his trishul and damaru from Parvati. He then plays his damaru and brings happiness back to the universe. Meanwhile, Arunasur is planning to misuse the boon Lord Brahma granted him.

dataFeedElement.name: Rachana Narayanankutty on the Show
dataFeedElement.description: Actor Rachana Narayanankutty graces the show with Rebecca Santhosh and Lakshmi Priya. Also, don't miss out on team Black and White's skit.

dataFeedElement.name: Khoka Gets Pelted
dataFeedElement.description: Khoka becomes a victim of public outrage after people believe him to be a terrorist. Elsewhere, Tori returns home. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Keshav tries to console Durva
dataFeedElement.description: Keshav learns of Bhupati's arrest and consoles a distraught Durva. Meanwhile, Mandodari asks Patil Anna to secure Bhupati's release, but he refuses. Chintamani and Vishwasrao, though, are happy at the turn of events. In jail, Bhupati asks Sujata to bail him out. Will she agree?

dataFeedElement.name: Mahul Blames Ayandeep
dataFeedElement.description: Mahul breaks down as she could not fulfil her dreams and blames Ayandeep for it.

dataFeedElement.name: Vilas Admires Radha
dataFeedElement.description: Abhay spikes the homemade medicine made for Neela. While Radha tends to Neela, Vilas admires Radha. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Sakshi Blackmails Malti
dataFeedElement.description: Ragini goes to Sharma House to find out the truth of Sakshi's pregnancy report. Meanwhile, Tamanna is troubled, on seeing Sakshi torturing Khushi. Watch full episodes of Sapna Babul Ka...Bidaai, online on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Prithviraj's Idol Retrieved
dataFeedElement.description: Kiranmala hides Donka's secret from Amrapali. Katkati, Pakati and Bajramala are worried about Prithviraj's idol. Donka is upset about Kiranmala's impending visit to Achinpur. Pishachini and Katkati try to convince Donka not to marry Kiranmala. Katkati enters Patalpuri and retrieves Prithviraj's ...

dataFeedElement.name: Mollika Visits Charu's House
dataFeedElement.description: While Bhanu comforts a dejected Charu, Arjo happily celebrates Rakhi Bandhan. Later, Jhumpa is shocked by Mollika's unexpected visit.

dataFeedElement.name: Parvati Forgets Mahadev
dataFeedElement.description: Mahadev is dejected about Parvati erasing all the memories related to him and returning to her parents’ home. Later, Ganesh in a disguise visits Parvati.

dataFeedElement.name: Insight into Nitya Parihara
dataFeedElement.description: Guruji talks about the Panchanga Shravana and the daily horoscope. In today's episode, he provides astrology-based solutions to a few callers and talks about Nitya Parihara in Shrirastu. He also talks about the importance of coconut during the puja.

dataFeedElement.name: Swathi Rages with Anger
dataFeedElement.description: Malini learns about Kasthoori and warns Balanandan about future consequences. Later, Swathi meets Kasthoori and boils with anger.

dataFeedElement.name: Shyam wins the college elections
dataFeedElement.description: Shyamala welcomes Meghana to her house. Shyam, Meghana and a bunch of mischievous students campaign in the college at night! Teja reveals to Indira about Meghana's prank as a ghost. Meghana is delighted as Shyam wins the college elections.

dataFeedElement.name: Sethu gets back at Chala Mary
dataFeedElement.description: Chala Mary forces Sethu to serve alcohol to Mathi and her. She pours the alcohol over Sethu's face and orders her to get some food. An enraged Sethu mixes washing powder in the food to teach Chala Mary, Mathy Suku, Shantha and Veni a lesson. Later, she feels guilty about it.

dataFeedElement.name: Shivam, Riya Dance Together
dataFeedElement.description: Shivam and Riya enjoy a dance together. Nimmi and Rani adulterate the haldi and apply it to Tilu. Riya learns about Shivam's contract. How will she react? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: A Promising Career for Leo Women
dataFeedElement.description: Guruji predicts that individuals born under Leo sun sign might be on financially safer side. He also adds that women will do good in their career.

dataFeedElement.name: Can Mohan Save Anumon?
dataFeedElement.description: Mohan gets into an altercation with Vijayan demanding information about Anumon. While Anumon feels suffocated inside the car, Nirmala spots her and alerts Mohan! Watch this episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Madhu has a request
dataFeedElement.description: Madhu requests Sonia to meet her. Meanwhile, Krishna reaches Sonia's house.  Madhu interrupts Krishna and Sonia's romantic moment. Krishna hides from Madhu. However, Madhu notices Krishna's car keys and questions Sonia. Later, Madhu requests Sonia to help Rajani find a job.

dataFeedElement.name: A Shocker for Mahua
dataFeedElement.description: Sukumar motivates Guriya to continue her studies. Later, he selects an expensive gift for her while a shocker awaits Mahua.

dataFeedElement.name: Madhura Learns Aaji's Plan
dataFeedElement.description: Madhura learns that Aaji and Tanushree are planning to separate Parth from her. Later, she informs Annapoorna about it. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: A Tough Moment for Krishna
dataFeedElement.description: Krishna reveals his true form to Saambh and Maharishi Sandeepani. While Radha tries to reason with Saambh, his statements leave Krishna deeply hurt.

dataFeedElement.name: Jyoti to Help Rusha
dataFeedElement.description: Gurudeb asks Rusha to follow the rituals of the puja to become the daughter-in-law of the house. Later, Jyoti decides to accompany her to the temple. Watch the latest and full episodes of Jibon Jyoti streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Dali Creates a Scene
dataFeedElement.description: Dali feels annoyed when Keshto demands that she make sweets. She creates a scene when Gobinda tries to hug her.

dataFeedElement.name: Neil Arrests Ananya
dataFeedElement.description: Avni tells Neil that someone is tracking Ananya Verma. Neil arrests the real Ananya in a dance bar! Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Ronak Stuns His Family
dataFeedElement.description: Ronak takes a stand when Muskaan is insulted at the reception party. After presenting some important documents to the family, he takes an unexpected step.

dataFeedElement.name: Lutfa's Clever Thinking
dataFeedElement.description: While Ramakanta hides in a barrel, Lutfa uses a clever trick to find him. Later, she ingeniously counters Mir Zafar's accusations in Alivardi's court.

dataFeedElement.name: Naveen Learns the Truth
dataFeedElement.description: Jagannath discloses Sukanya and Shalini's past to Naveen. Will this make Naveen change his mind? Later, a furious Abhi confronts Jagannath.

dataFeedElement.name: The Battle Begins!
dataFeedElement.description: Host Jagan welcomes the enthusiastic teams A, B, and C to the show. Tune in to find out which team is going to bag the grand prize.

dataFeedElement.name: Shantamma Rejects Naina
dataFeedElement.description: Shantamma rejects Naina's proposal for Jiva. Elsewhere, Keerthi informs Kavya about Satyajith's plan.

dataFeedElement.name: The Game of Rummy
dataFeedElement.description: Meenakshi praises Vettaiyan for his kind nature. Vaithi, Anbarasu and Tamizh decide to play a round of rummy. Vettaiyan too gains himself an entry to play with Tamizh, Anbarasu and Vaithi. Vettaiyan's winning streak loots everyone. Meenakshi challenges Vettaiyan, to win back the lost money.

dataFeedElement.name: Minu Is Adamant
dataFeedElement.description: Minu tries to convince Nilu about her identity, but the Pal family is confused. Later, she remains adamant in a decision regarding her son.

dataFeedElement.name: Will Siddharth Trust Malika?
dataFeedElement.description: Malika blames Siddharth for not supporting her. Siddharth's mother confronts Malika for defaming the Ranas. Will the Ranas accept Malika? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Has Utamrao Changed?
dataFeedElement.description: Revati reveals that Virat kept the money in Shridhar's room just to frame him. An angry Virat questions Utamrao regarding his behaviour in front of Revati and Shridhar. Is Utamrao worth trusting?

dataFeedElement.name: Rudra, ready with another plan
dataFeedElement.description: Gajanan informs Pushpa about seeing Sneha at the bank with Rudra. Mantu and Chikhlu are worried about the rift between Jasmine and Uma. Jasmine does not want Mantu to fall for Uma. Ramashrey visits Mantu and informs him about falling in love with a girl. Rudra readies another plan to deceive Sneha.

dataFeedElement.name: A twisted murder
dataFeedElement.description: A politician’s murder opens a can of worms for those closely associated with her. Investigations into the case push Inspector Dinesh Jaiswal into a tangled web of offenders.

dataFeedElement.name: Shree in Danger Again
dataFeedElement.description: When Shree gets attacked besides the river, Nagesh struggles to save her. Later, Revathi contacts Mala but she refuses to speak to her. Why?

dataFeedElement.name: Minu's Firm Resolve
dataFeedElement.description: Minu sticks to her decision and refuses to return home. Later, Sunanda decides to meet Minu.

dataFeedElement.name: Isha Meets Varalaxmi
dataFeedElement.description: As the Maha Puja commences, Varalaxmi refuses to perform the Maha Aarti. Just then, Isha comes there. Later, Avani gets mad at Varun and leaves the venue.

dataFeedElement.name: Bhimrao Returns Home!
dataFeedElement.description: Bhimrao is overwhelmed upon meeting his family. While he recalls fond memories with Ananda, Laxmi and Rama face a food-related crisis at home.

dataFeedElement.name: Myna Gets Petrified
dataFeedElement.description: Myna is terrified of Savitri's next plan. The next day, Nandini troubles Myna while performing tough rituals.

dataFeedElement.name: Jaydev confronts Surya
dataFeedElement.description: Vishwanathan Iyer feels happy for Shravani as she offers him sweets on the occasion of her first homecoming after marriage. Meanwhile, outside the court premises, Jaydev and Nisha challenge Surya that they will take Deeksha away from him. However, they are in for a shock.

dataFeedElement.name: Jhimli Slaps The Guest
dataFeedElement.description: Jhimli slaps Biswaroop's guest for teasing her. While Arnav insults Jhimli, Rupayan defends her. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Sarojini Provokes Chandramathi
dataFeedElement.description: Kasthoori shares her feelings with Sharath and seeks his help. Later, Sarojini provokes Chandramathi and proposes a plan.

dataFeedElement.name: Piya's cry for help
dataFeedElement.description: Haseena takes Abhay home when he hears Piya crying for help. He's able to connect to her and is shocked about what she is saying. Haseena refuses to take him back to Piya. Misha and Panchi reach the burnt house along with Mr. Hasti. Maithali and Siddharth proceed with their plan.

dataFeedElement.name: Sakthi Apologises to Siva
dataFeedElement.description: Siva agrees to face the village council as Rajalakshmi summons him for an allegation. Later, Sakthi apologises to him for Rajalakshmi's deed.

dataFeedElement.name: Jai annoyed with Rewa
dataFeedElement.description: TK wants to keep an eye on Jugnu. Bhagat pretends to be a plumber in front of Mamta and distracts her attention from Rewa. Elsewhere, Jai is suspicious, suspecting Rewa to be having an affair with Bhagat and vents his anger on her. However, he regrets hurting Rewa's sentiments.

dataFeedElement.name: Pramad insults Kumud
dataFeedElement.description: Pramad insults Kumud and tries to slap her but Budhidhan orders him to reach office immediately. Pramad then insults Naveenchandra. Buddhidhan gets angry, but Naveenchandra stops him from slapping Pramad. Later, Pramad asks for money from Saubhagyadevi.

dataFeedElement.name: Ready, Steady, Chicken!
dataFeedElement.description: While Girija Lokesh prepares a delicious Kheema Godhi Roti, Chef Pradeep Anand introduces us to a mouthwatering Crispy Chicken. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Rajavardhan apologises to Rajani
dataFeedElement.description: Vishnu takes a selfie with Rajani and taunts her. Shyamili panics. Rajavardhan apologises to Rajani for lashing out at her on account of Shyamili. He permits Rajani to visit her parents against Kusuma's will.

dataFeedElement.name: Sirappu Patimandram
dataFeedElement.description: Watch the engaging debate of the intellectuals discussing the possibilities and difficulties of living a healthy and prosperous life in the contemporary age.

dataFeedElement.name: Will Geet Find Dev?
dataFeedElement.description: Geet tells Rajji about her plan to search for Dev. Brij gets angry with Darji for allowing Geet to go out. Will she be able to find him?

dataFeedElement.name: Rangi Meets Lakshmi
dataFeedElement.description: Lakshmi is very happy to meet Rangi, her twin. Later, Murthy reveals to Rangi about the story of her past. How will she react?

dataFeedElement.name: Bangshi's Shocking Verdict
dataFeedElement.description: The Senguptas are horrified to see a time bomb in the house while Supratim goes missing from the court. Later, Shrujo requests Bangshi to reveal the truth.

dataFeedElement.name: Balram, Banasur's Fierce Face-off
dataFeedElement.description: Usha plans to help Saambh, Anirudh, Pradyumna escape from the prison. While Saambh's plan goes for a toss, Balram and Banasur engage in a fierce face-off.

dataFeedElement.name: Sudha convinces Saravana Perumal
dataFeedElement.description: Soundharya asks Saravanan to bring his grandparents to discuss something. Meanwhile, Sudha tells Saravana Perumal that she accepted the proposal, because she feels that Saravanan is madly in love with Meenatchi. Later, Meenatchi takes Saravanan to meet her grandparents.

dataFeedElement.name: Santosh returns home
dataFeedElement.description: Sooraj thanks Pooja for donating one of her kidneys to Santosh. Meanwhile, Mohit informs Emily that Santosh signed the power of attorney papers. Later, Santosh asks Sooraj about Sandhya. Santosh returns from the hospital. Will Santosh forgive Mohit and Vikram for their misdeed?

dataFeedElement.name: Santoshi Scolds Meenakshi
dataFeedElement.description: Chandu hands over the chip to Balaraju. Lalitha snaps back at Surya's family for criticising her while Santoshi scolds Meenakshi for her misdeed. Watch this episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Onam special
dataFeedElement.description: Host Adv Joy John Antony welcomes the guests -- cartoonist Sukumar, Sudeep Kumar, Dr Divya, Manu Mangomb and Ranju Chalakkudy. The highlights are Kalabhavan Mani's songs and the guests' opinions on Onam celebrations.

dataFeedElement.name: Anushka Plays A Prank On Kabir
dataFeedElement.description: Saraswatichandra and Kumud discuss the things they need to decorate their house. Anushka sprinkles itching powder on Kabir's t-shirt. He suffers from itching while having food. Saraswatichandra brings food for Kumud and decides to feed her. However, he is interrupted. Who interrupts them?

dataFeedElement.name: Goons Attack Sharan!
dataFeedElement.description: A group of goons try to stab Sharan. Menon arrives at the spot and confronts them. Will he be able to save Sharan? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Ushoshi is pregnant
dataFeedElement.description: Bhavani asks Ushoshi to be a homemaker and forget her dream of becoming an IPS officer. Meanwhile, Soma and Kakoli try to instigate Kattayani against Ushoshi. Bhavani's house is filled with delight with the news of Ushoshi’s pregnancy. Will Soma and Kakoli succeed in their misdeed?

dataFeedElement.name: Tadrishi is the Kidnapper!
dataFeedElement.description: Adorini is shocked to learn that she has been abducted by Tadrishi. Further, Adinath vows to find Adorini at any cost. Watch the latest and full episodes of Adorini streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Anokhi to Collect Silver Coins
dataFeedElement.description: Dadaji asks Parikshit and Pulkit to sing in the jagran. The pandit tells Anokhi to collect seven silver coins in order to find Goddess Laxmi's idol.

partOfSeries.name: Humko Tumse Ho Gaya Hai Pyaar Kya Karein

dataFeedElement.name: Anand Passes Away!
dataFeedElement.description: Sandeep manages to console Amrutha with a lie. However, he is shocked on learning about Anand succumbing to his injuries.

dataFeedElement.name: Malar's New MD!
dataFeedElement.description: Professor Ram calls Jr. Sakthi and tries to blackmail her. Malar plays her cards very cleverly and appoints a new MD, Arjun, to replace Sakthi. Watch the latest and full episodes of Pagal Nilavu streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Unlimited entertainment
dataFeedElement.description: Parizaad welcomes Navjot Singh Sidhu and Shakti Kapoor on the show. Gaurav Sharma presents some funny acts. Afterwards, Amir Rambo, Dharsi, Ali Hassan, Irfan Malik and Raju Srivastava enter the stage and entertain the audience. Later, Navjot Singh Sidhu and Shakti Kapoor encourage the performers.

dataFeedElement.name: Tori Is Questioned
dataFeedElement.description: Tori informs Khoka about Photik's misdeeds. Jagannath questions Tori when she returns home. Tori rebukes him for keeping her in the dark about Khoka's real parents, while Aroti points a finger at Tori's character. Watch the latest and full episodes of Khoka Babu streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Shagun Exposes Param!
dataFeedElement.description: Shagun reveals to the Bhallas that there's something brewing between Param and Pooja. Meanwhile, Raman keeps an eye on Nikhil and Ruhi. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Kaju upset with Neel’s affair
dataFeedElement.description: Arshi is surprised to know that Kaju is Neel’s wife. Kaju on the other hand, is upset about Neel’s affair with Arshi. She refuses to go out with him in spite of the family members’ insistence. Meanwhile, Parijat apologises to Nandini.

dataFeedElement.name: Vishakha Impresses Everyone
dataFeedElement.description: Vishakha defends Nandhini when Helena speaks ill about her. Chandhira sets out to find Nandan's place. Later, Vishakha impresses everyone by calming down baby Bindusara. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Bani-Turjo Get Married!
dataFeedElement.description: Bani and Turjo perform the wedding rituals. Tori determines not to go back to Kusumpur as Khoka lied to her. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Ishita-Raman do a bedroom dance
dataFeedElement.description: Raman and Ishita dance passionately when the opportunity presents itself. Later, Aditya deliberately takes the wrong medicine. His condition worsens and he is admitted to the hospital. Ashok refuses to sign the release form for Aditya’s surgery. Will Raman be able to save Aditya?

dataFeedElement.name: Srinivas Is Hospitalised
dataFeedElement.description: Srinivas asks the pujari to serve the thirtham to him before serving it to Sureka. Everyone is horrified when the poison hits Srinivas. Padma and Sureka worry for him while Devi is frustrated over Srinivas foiling her attempt.

dataFeedElement.name: Mohini Stops Ruby
dataFeedElement.description: Mohini stops Ruby from helping Ansh and Piya. Meanwhile, Nishanth and Saavi find a clue about the Asura.

dataFeedElement.name: Ratan scolds Veera
dataFeedElement.description: Ranvijay ignores Veera completely. Ratan scolds Veera for depending on Ranvijay for everything. Veera accidentally falls while tugging her school bag from Ratan. Ranvijay cannot bear to see this and confronts Ratan. Will Veera finally reunite with her brother?

dataFeedElement.name: Sebastian has a crush on Rosy
dataFeedElement.description: Rosy faints when she sees the picture, which a marriage broker shows her. Oudhakutty gets drunk and gets into an argument with Mariamma. He leaves the house to go back to Palai. The new sub inspector of police, Sebastian comes to town. He tells father Punjekadan that he would like to marry Rosy!

dataFeedElement.name: Prathapsankar Catches Pournami
dataFeedElement.description: Prathapsankar finds Pournami with Prem at the guest house. Meanwhile, Annie and Poulose meet their lawyer.

dataFeedElement.name: Kanmani Breaks Down
dataFeedElement.description: Kanmani breaks down as Santhosh gets engaged with Deepika. Later, Deepika orders her to stay away from Santhosh.

dataFeedElement.name: Gandhari opens her eyes
dataFeedElement.description: Krishna sees a naked Duryodhana going to his mother. On Krishna's advice that one should not go before one's mother in that state, Duryodhana covers himself with a banana leaf and goes to see Gandhari. Every part of his she sees turns invincible. But what about the parts that were covered?

dataFeedElement.name: Mohit and Nandini break up
dataFeedElement.description: On learning about Gayatri's disapproval, Nandini and Mohit decide to end their relationship. Nandini agrees to her parents' choice of a groom, following which Shankari is called. The family is shocked. Meanwhile, Naitik offers a lift to Rajshri and Akshara, seeing their car break down.

dataFeedElement.name: Devious Brothers
dataFeedElement.description: Barkha belongs to a poor family. She gets married to Rishab. However, Rishab manipulates her into getting intimate with his brother, Rajat who is married to Tina. They threaten Barkha's mother to keep silent!

dataFeedElement.name: Sooraj Fails to Notice the Note
dataFeedElement.description: Sooraj fails to notice Sandhya's note in his gift envelope. However, he plans to give a speech in Sandhaya’s honour at her felicitation function. But Sandhya accidently burns the gift envelope. Has her ambition also been burnt along with the envelope?

dataFeedElement.name: Jiva Confronts Devaki
dataFeedElement.description: Shwetha and Ravi cleverly lure Naveen into their trap. Elsewhere, Jiva gets suspicious and confronts Devaki about her accident.

dataFeedElement.name: Kumari remains outraged
dataFeedElement.description: Banasur sets out to attack Adi Shakti, and desperately searches for her. Meanwhile, Kumari remains outraged and Lord Vishnu tries to placate her. Despite being defeated by Bhoothnath, Banasur boasts of his power and declares himself as the supreme being. Will Banasur’s ego be snubbed?

dataFeedElement.name: Souparnika, Sajan on the show
dataFeedElement.description: In this episode, Chef Reena Basheer prepares a delicious mutta ularthiyathu. Actors Souparnika and Sajan prepare a special dish named 'kovayka meencurry'.

dataFeedElement.name: Behind The Scenes Hungama
dataFeedElement.description: Hostess Sujatha, with her Paakashaale team, shares "behind the scenes" experience. Know about Guruji's journey in guiding people from Anandavani team. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Sandhya sews Sooraj's kurta
dataFeedElement.description: Sandhya restarts Sooraj's scooter and Sooraj chides her for prying. Chotu asks Sandhya for permission to leave early on the pretext of getting Sooraj's kurta sewn. Sandhya hesitates to sew it in front of Chotu. Santosh begs Sooraj to call Sandhya. Will Sooraj agree?

dataFeedElement.name: Constructing A Kalyana Mandapam
dataFeedElement.description: Guruji indicates the day suitable for Oushadha Seva and predicts the daily horoscope. Shaji Joseph addresses a viewer's query regarding the construction of a Kalyana Mandapam. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Mayavathi's Trick Goes in Vain
dataFeedElement.description: The marketing manager feels deceived when he receives garments instead of jam and fumes at Arjun. Varsha rejoices on learning the same. Kiran manages to deliver the jam on time, thus saving the Desais from an embarrassment. Urmila suspects Mayavathi to be the mastermind behind this ploy.

dataFeedElement.name: Surekha Provokes Ekka
dataFeedElement.description: Surekha is angry with Ekka for supporting Devyani and puts forth a condition. Ekka learns that Dr Kamath has resigned from his job and has not committed suicide. Surekha manipulates Ekka's emotions and tries to provoke him against Devyani. Ekka and Devyani look after Vakratunda.

dataFeedElement.name: Lust ruins a relationship
dataFeedElement.description: Kavita finds Praveen's friends and their get-together quite unusual. During an outing, Kavita becomes outraged on learning something. What is it?

dataFeedElement.name: Simi Lashes Out at Swadheenta
dataFeedElement.description: Swadheenta and Suhasini have a confrontation about the case. An upset Adarsh promises Swadheenta that he will ensure Haider gets hanged! Later, Simi comes to know about Abhay's killer. Meanwhile, there is a red alert for Iftikar aka Arvind.

dataFeedElement.name: Maanvi's first day of treatment
dataFeedElement.description: Madan and Beeji take Maanvi to the hospital for treatment. Manan assures them of Maanvi getting a good treatment there. Madan and Beeji, then, worry about the treatment expenses. Later, Beeji tells Badi Beeji about Maanvi’s ailment. How does Badi Beeji react on learning about Maanvi’s cancer?

partOfSeries.name: Ek Hazaaron Mein Meri Behna Hai

dataFeedElement.name: Shanti Rejects Sharmili's Request
dataFeedElement.description: Riya tries to convince Kaushalya that she is not helping Mohit. Shanti finds out that Raghav had asked Nimmi to design a lehenga for Kaushalya. The pandit asks Shanti to invite eleven women for a ceremony. Shanti refuses when Sharmili requests her to let Preeti meet Vyom.

dataFeedElement.name: Sanjukta Provokes Rusha
dataFeedElement.description: Siddhartha is surprised to see Jyoti giving food to the orphan kids. Sanjukta tries to provoke Rusha against Pratima and Jyoti. Watch the latest and full episodes of Jibon Jyoti streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Kanya decides to stay back
dataFeedElement.description: Nandan and Jagadamba argue with Kanya. Kanya decides to stay at her parents' house. Kunju Shekaran and Kanya insult Karthika and Balachandran. Dr Merrina is dejected for not knowing Balachandran and Karthika's whereabouts. Will Karthika prove her innocence?

dataFeedElement.name: Jayaram Joins the Show
dataFeedElement.description: Jayaram joins the show with the cast of Marconi Mathai to talk about their experiences with the move. Also, catch up with the latest news from Mollywood.

dataFeedElement.name: Piya Gets Arrested
dataFeedElement.description: Adi manages to save Ansh and Piya from getting caught. While Nishant stumbles upon a vital clue, Abhay places Piya under arrest.

dataFeedElement.name: Abhro suspects Jhilmil
dataFeedElement.description: Konok informs Oli that Rahul visited their house. Indira decides to wait for Jhilmil to perform the Kali Puja rituals. Meanwhile, Abhro suspects Jhilmil’s behaviour. Jhilmil, however, is determined to ruin Konok’s life. Will Jhilmil succeed in harming Konok?

dataFeedElement.name: Piku Learns About Ishaan's Love
dataFeedElement.description: Ishaan beats up Chunki as he tries to molest Piku. Piku stops Ishaan. Later, she is delighted to learn from Ishaan about his love for her. Ishaan pays Chunki the money that Piku owes him.

dataFeedElement.name: Surya is happy for Shravani
dataFeedElement.description: Shravani fasts for Surya's wellbeing. She rejoices as she regains her license and can re-open her clinic. Surya feels content on seeing Sharavani's happy. Jaydev takes charge as Bangalore Business Association's President and insults Surya in the press conference.

dataFeedElement.name: An indecent landlord
dataFeedElement.description: A married couple move into a rented apartment. As time passes by, the couple encounters several incidents of harassment. Later, they realise that their landlord had immoral intentions and created problems on purpose. Will the duo be able to expose their landlord?

dataFeedElement.name: Lekshmi scolds Chinnu
dataFeedElement.description: Chinnu helps Meenakshi recreate Ponnu’s past life. Lekshmi finds Chinnu and scolds her. Chinnu tells Chechi about the change in Meenakshi’s behaviour. Chechi berates Chinnu for what she has done and decides to tell Meenakshi's truth to her grandmother.

dataFeedElement.name: Latheef Visits Sreemangalam
dataFeedElement.description: Latheef visits Sreemangalam to check on Mahi's health condition. Later, he threatens Vishwanathan when the latter asks him to leave.

dataFeedElement.name: Bhagya Faces the Heat
dataFeedElement.description: Deepa's father assaults Bhagya for insulting Deepa. Aditya feels relieved on learning that Soundarya has fixed his marriage with Shravya. Watch the latest and full episodes of Karthika Deepam streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Panchagusti Ammavan Arrives!
dataFeedElement.description: Kuriakose and Susu meet Sivadasan's uncle and trick him. Panchagusti Ammavan manages to find Sivadasan's house and shares his ordeal of being cheated.

dataFeedElement.name: Rudra is Hospitalised
dataFeedElement.description: Akash and Amrutha hospitalise Rudra. Jayanthi fears that Amrutha might learn her secrets from Rudra. Later, Rudra's revelations leave Amrutha disturbed. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Preeti Goes Missing
dataFeedElement.description: The Shrivastavs and the Sinhas gather for Preeti's sangeet. Bansi fools Sarla by sending a picture of Rajinder disguised as Mohit. Shanti and Sarla ask Pari not to create a scene at the sangeet. Preeti goes missing after a sudden power cut. Sarla stops Sharmili from finding out about it.

dataFeedElement.name: Sanjay Rescues Dharaa
dataFeedElement.description: A few men attack Bashir. Sanjay rescues Dharaa from Salamat and his associates. Verma informs Bhanu Pratap that their plan against Dharaa is working.

dataFeedElement.name: A Dose of Laughter
dataFeedElement.description: Sit back and enjoy as three fun-loving couples take on the challenge to perform the tasks.

dataFeedElement.name: Automation Test Episode for API Test of replication update
dataFeedElement.description: This is an episode for API Automation test for replication of episode from one tenant to another

dataFeedElement.name: Heer Slaps Ashlesha
dataFeedElement.description: Heer slaps Ashlesha for misleading her and Prem. She feels guilty about misunderstanding Prem. What will Ashlesha’s next move be? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

partOfSeries.name: Kis Desh Mein Hai Meraa Dil

dataFeedElement.name: Rano refuses to forgive Suhana
dataFeedElement.description: The Kashyap family makes arrangements for the engagement. Suhana and Ilesh discuss the script with the writer. Suhana tells the director to apologise to Rano. Rano is angry when Suhana offers to buy an expensive dress for Sanjana on Radha's behalf. Will Rano forgive Suhana?

dataFeedElement.name: Sumit Selects a Saree For Kumkum
dataFeedElement.description: Sumit selects saris for the ladies. In order to please Kumkum, Sumit specially orders a sari for her. All the ladies of the Wadhwa family apply mehendi on the eve of Karwa Chauth. Watch full episodes of Kumkum Ek Pyara Sa Bandhan, online on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Naira Is Shocked
dataFeedElement.description: Naira is shocked to learn about a complaint lodged against her dance academy. Later, Surekha insults Swarna for advising her about parenting. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Nandan Advises Annie
dataFeedElement.description: Nandan suggests Annie wait for Prem to change his mind. Later, Rajalakshmi questions Pournami about Prem's whereabouts.

dataFeedElement.name: Facing Elimination
dataFeedElement.description: The latest hits round finally comes to an end with Lakshmi, Shibi, Kiran Sravan, Arvind and Latha Krishna from Team Mano performing. The weakest performers from all three teams are assembled and one faces elimination. Who will it be?

dataFeedElement.name: Meghana Confides in Shyam
dataFeedElement.description: Meghana mistakes Teja's concern for Sunaina to be his love for her. She confides in Shyam and expresses a wish to set up a meeting between Sunaina and Teja to get a solution to all their problems. Indira feels helpless as Meghana refuses to return home and disconnects her call abruptly.

dataFeedElement.name: Goons Chase Durga!
dataFeedElement.description: As Durga sets out for her practice, few goons attack her. Can she fight them? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Rajeshwari Infuriates Rangi
dataFeedElement.description: Lakshmi and Desamukhi learn a shocking news about Kalyan at the hospital. Elsewhere, Rangi gets furious with Rajeshwari's words about Chakravarthy.

dataFeedElement.name: Kabir Takes a Stand for Kavya
dataFeedElement.description: Kabir takes a stand for Kavya against Prem. Later, there is protest when Prem slaps a journalist at the conference.

dataFeedElement.name: Automation Test Episode for API Test of replication
dataFeedElement.description: This is an episode for API Automation test for replication of episode from one tenant to another

dataFeedElement.name: The army captures Rajneil
dataFeedElement.description: Rajneil is captured by the army corps. Meanwhile, Tara and Agni get furious upon not finding Rajneil. Tara rebukes Murli for rescuing Shakti from the bomb blast. Major Vikram sustains a bullet injury and fails to free Juhi. Will the prisoners free themselves from the militants?

dataFeedElement.name: Goons kidnap Varsha
dataFeedElement.description: Goons kidnap Varsha and call Vinay to threaten him. But Vinay thinks that Varsha is playing a prank on him and cuts the call. The kidnappers then call up Yashoda and threaten her. She goes to meet Shakuntala Devi to seek her help in rescuing Varsha, but they refuse to believe her.

dataFeedElement.name: Mahalakshmi's Clever Suggestion
dataFeedElement.description: Anand comes up with a smart plan to get closer to Varam. Later, Mahalakshmi gives Raja Babu a suggestion.

dataFeedElement.name: Arjun Is Arrested
dataFeedElement.description: Vennela accuses Arjun of assaulting Narasimha Rao and gets him arrested. Keshava requests her to get Arjun released. Will she oblige? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: A Dracula King
dataFeedElement.description: A few TV reporters almost become news when they visit a deserted mansion on a hill. Things get out of control when their host turns out to be a Dracula.

dataFeedElement.name: Can Pratap Save Neha?
dataFeedElement.description: Neha meets with an accident when a stranger pushes her deliberately. Prataprao is shattered when Neha tells him that her car's brake failed.

dataFeedElement.name: Irabati Is Jailed!
dataFeedElement.description: Irabati is heartbroken when Akash arrives with the police. While Neel confronts Shalini about Samrat, Irabati learns a shocking fact in jail.

dataFeedElement.name: The wedding games begin
dataFeedElement.description: Soumya and Suhani explain the game - the pots contain rings and have to be broken. Soumya and Krishna break the pots and find the the rings. Krishna, Soumya, Yuvraaj and Suhani dance to entertain the guests. A lot more happens at the wedding!

dataFeedElement.name: Krishna meets Nitin
dataFeedElement.description: Naina is upset by Adarsh's refusal to help the family financially and begins to ignore him. Angad hints to Krishna that Nitin is Pratigya's fiance. Nitin vows never to do anything that might hurt Pratigya. What happens when Krishna sees Nitin outside her house?

dataFeedElement.name: Swapna Confronts Chennakeshava
dataFeedElement.description: Swapna is happy about the delay in Aditya's marriage. Madhura insists on wearing Swapna's jewellery. Swapna confronts Chennakeshava for giving her ornaments to Madhura. Later, Aditya comes to Swapna's aid when Virupakshi humiliates her.

dataFeedElement.name: The wedding concludes
dataFeedElement.description: Teja and Meghana's wedding concludes. Samarth takes leave from Durga. The people at achhi's protest request Samarth to re-unite with Prarthana. Sunaina calls Teja's mobile but Indira receives her call and later throws away the sim card. Teja and Meghana leave the wedding venue in style.

dataFeedElement.name: Fun at Nedumangad College
dataFeedElement.description: Akhil visits Nedumangad Government College and engages the students in a hilarious dialogue recreation activity. This is followed by an epic dubsmash performance. Watch the latest and full episodes of Doopa Mashe streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Tejaswini is not happy
dataFeedElement.description: Tejaswini tells Sayali that she is unable to adjust to her new life. Sayali tells Vihaan the same. Godha is furious at Sayali for supporting Tejaswini. Later, Godha performs Vihaan and Tejaswini’s post-marital rituals.

dataFeedElement.name: Mulla Is Overwhelmed
dataFeedElement.description: A possessed Dhanam predicts a good fortune for the family. Later, Mulla feels overwhelmed as Kathir takes care of her.

dataFeedElement.name: Pammi and Pamela ruin the sweets
dataFeedElement.description: Pammi and Pamela ruin the sweets brought by Pakhi and Piu. Ananya calls Krishnendu and requests him to return early. However, Aranya insults Pakhi for her incapability. Even as Piu tries to give an explanation, Pakhi promises Aranya that she would remake the sweets.

dataFeedElement.name: Eggless nankhatai
dataFeedElement.description: Chef Reena Basheer prepares a tasty kalumakaya curry.Renowned small screen actress, Niya aka Lakshmi of Amma fame, rustles up today's special, eggless nankhatai!

dataFeedElement.name: Devyani breaks down
dataFeedElement.description: Surekha is pleased with the success of her plot against Devyani. Devyani breaks down thinking about Ekka's sacrifice. Ekka scolds Devyani for attempting suicide. He gets emotional when Devyani tearfully expresses her gratitude to him. Surekha gets irritated seeing them together.

dataFeedElement.name: Akshara meets Naresh's mother
dataFeedElement.description: After the Singhania family performs Kanya puja in their house, Naitik informs his family about Naresh's health. Later, Akshara and Naitik visit the police station, where they meet Naresh's mother. She pleads for forgiveness from Akshara on Naresh's behalf. Will Akshara forgive Naresh?

dataFeedElement.name: Meera to Work at Maansi's House
dataFeedElement.description: Maansi invites Meera to work at her house. Later, she warns Rishikesh of dire consequences if he fails to oust Meera. Watch the latest and full episodes of Lek Mazhi Ladki streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Vicky attacks Ranvijay
dataFeedElement.description: Avanti is frustrated with Virat as she does not want to work as his secretary. However, she is happy noticing Virat's concern for her. Vicky is shocked about Ranvijay's relationship with Kavya. Frustrated, he attacks Ranvijay in an intoxicated state! Virat is happy to host a party.

dataFeedElement.name: Shanti's Shocking Decision
dataFeedElement.description: Shanti misunderstands Shimul and decides to get her and Neel divorced. However, Shanti's family members are unhappy with her decision. Watch the latest and full episodes of Pratidaan streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: What Is Yuvaan's Demand?
dataFeedElement.description: Harman tries to provoke Yuvaan at the club house. Yuvaan asks Sucharita to fulfill his demand when she requests him to return home.

dataFeedElement.name: Shanmugam's Wise Move
dataFeedElement.description: Shanmugam makes it all right between both the families and confirms Kaveri and Ashok's wedding. Later, Sethu confronts Rohini about her feelings for Gautham. Watch the full and latest episodes of Ponmagal Vanthaal streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: The secret it out!
dataFeedElement.description: Ayush becomes shocked to see Madhu at the wedding. However, Jaya asks him to focus on completing the rituals. Madhu's behaviour surprises Tutul's family. Later, Chandrashekhar tries to prevent reporters from interviewing Ayush.

dataFeedElement.name: Gayatri and Akshara patch up
dataFeedElement.description: Gayatri gets to know that Akshara plans on teaching Naksh household chores. This angers her and she argues with Akshara about it. Will they patch up?

dataFeedElement.name: Ankith Discloses it All
dataFeedElement.description: Sindhu loses her cool after learning about Chakri's misdeeds. Elsewhere, Ankith reveals about Sada's love interest to Sukanya.

dataFeedElement.name: Ishita's license is cancelled
dataFeedElement.description: Raman shows a video clip of Ishita's insane behaviour and blackmails her into defending him and his friends. She receives a legal notice cancelling her medical license. She rushes to court. Meanwhile, Ashok tries to get friendly with Mihika. Will Ishita try to meet Sooraj?

dataFeedElement.name: Court Order in Manoj's Name
dataFeedElement.description: Anu feels betrayed as Arjun advises her to forget Manoj and abort the child. She calls Ashok and seeks his help to bring Manoj to justice. Arjun feels anxious seeing a court order issued in Manoj's name. Priya vows to get Anu married to Manoj.

dataFeedElement.name: New Recipes For You
dataFeedElement.description: Treat your taste buds with yummy Papaya Paysa prepared by Chandrakala, delicious Veg Curry by Meena and Walnut Burfi by Dr Shubamangala Acharya. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Hrithik Roshan and Suzanne Roshan
dataFeedElement.description: Karan Johar hosts Hrithik Roshan and his wife Suzanne. The duo talk about their marriage, kids and profession. Hrithik talks about his performance in Guzaarish and the controversy surrounding his film and actor Salman Khan. Later, Hrithik's fans in the film industry express their views about his...

dataFeedElement.name: Yudhishthir informs Arjun that he will have to fight with Lord Indra
dataFeedElement.description: Takshak decides to attack the Pandavas and the citizens of Hastinapur for entering his territory. The Pandavas fight against Takshaks army, to protect the citizens of Hastinapur. Yudhishthir persuades Takshak to cease the attack, but in vain. Arjun injures Takshak, hence, he retreats. Draupadi b...

dataFeedElement.name: Vini apologises to Ratree
dataFeedElement.description: Vini tries to comfort Titiya after she has a nightmare. The next day, Titiya performs her pre-marriage rituals. Ratree's statements fill Titiya with suspicion. Vini is tense as she fails to contact Prithish and Ahona. Vini apologises to Ratree on Mohul's insistence.

dataFeedElement.name: Black Pandi and Umeshwari
dataFeedElement.description: This program is a behind-the-scenes peek into celebrity weddings, with audiences getting a glimpse of all the colour, fun and ceremony that make up the Big Fat Indian Wedding. This episode features the wedding of Pandi and Umeshwari.

dataFeedElement.name: Krishna's Ingenious Plan
dataFeedElement.description: Kalyavan is lured into a trap by Krishna's smart plan while Radha refuses to give up on Krishna. Later, Jarasandh announces Shishupal and Rukmini's marriage.

dataFeedElement.name: Geet misunderstands Maan
dataFeedElement.description: Maan makes Geet the co-owner of Khurana constructions. However, Geet thinks that Maan used her to bail out Dev. She doesn't listen to him and refuses to get married to him. She tells the media that Maan is marrying her to save Dev. Will the misunderstanding be cleared?

dataFeedElement.name: Humour With Drama
dataFeedElement.description: Lappam and Uthappam entertain the viewers with their amusing humour while adding to the fun by playing hilarious comedy clips from our favourite movies.

dataFeedElement.name: Kanmani in Trouble?
dataFeedElement.description: Deepika instructs the goons to execute her plan against Kanmani. Meanwhile, an elated Subbu spends some quality time with the family.

dataFeedElement.name: Amrapali Apologises to Madhura
dataFeedElement.description: Vikram tells Amrapali about his plan against Madhura. Ajinkya tells Madhura about Vikram's plan to gain her faith. He provokes Madhura against Vikram, while Amrapali apologises to Madhura for trying to kill her.

dataFeedElement.name: Soundharya Blames Kannamma
dataFeedElement.description: Soundharya blames Kannamma for Anjali's present condition. Later, Kannamma reveals everything to Barathi.

dataFeedElement.name: Raghuram Sends Jayanthi Away
dataFeedElement.description: Raghuram asks Jayanthi to stay at Viswanath's house and not to return to his home. Akash warns Chakri to stay away from Amrutha. Watch the latest and full episodes of Kumkuma Puvvu streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Mounitha Is Determined
dataFeedElement.description: Mounitha is determined to marry Karthik soon. However, with Deepa's visit, there is happiness in Soundarya's family.

dataFeedElement.name: A Good Day for Charu
dataFeedElement.description: Charu gets a job at the school while Arjo and Angshu pay a visit. Later, Arjo berates a teacher for making some derogatory comment about blind people.

dataFeedElement.name: Ashwin Begs for Forgiveness
dataFeedElement.description: Ashwin begs Sharada for forgiveness for his harsh behaviour towards her. Later, Indrani gets extremely suspicious about the locked room in the house.

dataFeedElement.name: Geet gets a gift from Maan
dataFeedElement.description: Reena troubles Dev and Lucky again. Geet finds a gift on the terrace and wonders if Maan has send it. However, she senses someone’s presence, panics and throws off the gift. Can she find who it was?

dataFeedElement.name: Rajlaxmi consoles Rama
dataFeedElement.description: Rama informs everyone that Jaywant is her husband even as the latter pretends ignorance. Meanwhile, Rupali, Devaki and Soham insist that Rajlaxmi ask Rama to leave the Sardeshmukh house immediately.

dataFeedElement.name: Puttan's Plan Works
dataFeedElement.description: Puttan tactfully prevents Jhilmil and Imli Devi from leaving Ulta Pradesh. Chaitu’s uncle to whom he had entrusted his money is on his death bed. Puttan is unable to learn from him about Chaitu’s money.

partOfSeries.name: Har Shaakh Pe Ullu Baithaa Hai

dataFeedElement.name: Vidhi Is Shattered
dataFeedElement.description: Vidhi finds Nikhil's panic over his missing phone weird while Vinod reveals his relationship to Chandrakant. Later, Vidhi is shattered.

dataFeedElement.name: Srivalli's Engagement Ceremony
dataFeedElement.description: The family celebrates Parthu and Srivalli's engagement ceremony. However, things take an ugly turn when Ambika makes a shocking revelation.

dataFeedElement.name: Sandhya-Sooraj recall their past
dataFeedElement.description: Sandhya stuns everyone with her decision to wear a salwar kameez. Bhabasa asks Santosh to grant Sandhya's wish. Sooraj and Sandhya reminisce about their past. Sandhya teases him and they sleep together in the hall as the roof of their bedroom starts leaking.

dataFeedElement.name: Arjun Tries to Convince Saranya
dataFeedElement.description: Arjun learns about Saranya's decision and tries to convince her to reunite with Vikram. Meanwhile, Vikram signs the transfer documents.

dataFeedElement.name: Bhandasur tries to enter Kailash
dataFeedElement.description: While Mahadev sympathises with Prithvi Devi, Tuhund attacks the gods and they fight back. Tuhund and Indradev take on each other and Kartikey engages Lohitang. Meanwhile, Bhandasur attempts to enter Kailash, only to be stopped by Ganesha.

dataFeedElement.name: Niranjan Visits Surya's House
dataFeedElement.description: Devansh and Vittal engage in a conversation about relationships. Later, Surya feels excited when Niranjan visits her house. Watch the latest and full episodes of Neeli Kaluvalu streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Anika's Plan Backfires!
dataFeedElement.description: As per Rudra's plan, Anika puts up an act. Later, Shivaay decides to get engaged to Ragini. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Hasmukh Is Devastated update
dataFeedElement.description: Leela's anger against Hasmukh and Anupama leaves the family shocked. Hasmukh feels shattered when Leela humiliates him in front of everyone.

dataFeedElement.name: Param Traces Sanjay’s Number
dataFeedElement.description: Param and Joba manage to trace Sanjay’s phone number and worry about his intentions. Elsewhere, Tandra’s mother pretends to be ill in order to mislead the Senguptas. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: A Warning for Mrunalini
dataFeedElement.description: Radha mistakes Krishna to be the prospective groom and agrees to talk to him. Elsewhere, Daksha warns Mrunalini to mend her ways.

dataFeedElement.name: The music troupe
dataFeedElement.description: Our heroes reach their new hostel only to witness their cruel warden punishing one of the students there. The warden reveals their true monitory conditions. The boys decide to earn money to support themselves. Vijay comes up with the idea of starting a music troupe.

dataFeedElement.name: Sunil-Shyam Pacify Each Other!
dataFeedElement.description: Sunil and Shyam pacify each other on their grief over Sunaina's critical condition at the hospital. Meghana's dream haunts her and makes her feel anxious. She feels she should confide her fear to someone to relieve her from her stress. Sunaina feels shattered learning about her condition.

dataFeedElement.name: Bharat Reveals the Truth
dataFeedElement.description: Bharat reveals the truth about Sita's sacrifice. Later, Shailu overhears Raghuram and Bharat's conversation.

dataFeedElement.name: What's on Devaraj's Mind?
dataFeedElement.description: Karthik criticises Sembaruthi for spending her time on menial tasks and neglecting Rajasekar. Devaraj conspires against Karthik. Watch the latest and full episodes of Raja Rani streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Neha's Secret Mission
dataFeedElement.description: Neha decides to clear Prataprao's doubt and collects his hair sample for the DNA test. Later, Vandana and Padmaja play carrom to entertain Pari. Watch the latest and full episodes of Nakalat Saare Ghadle streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Shubho urges Neel to decide
dataFeedElement.description: Judo informs Ananya and Parijat that he is getting married to Mimi, the coming Sunday. Later, Parijat confronts Nandini for not caring about Ananya. Soon, Shubho brings Arshi to their house, and urges Neel to take a decision about his and Arshi’s marriage.

dataFeedElement.name: Krishnaveni's Condition for Sudha
dataFeedElement.description: Krishnaveni lays a condition to Sudha before agreeing for her marriage with Arjun. Later, Pushpa gives a suggestion to Sudha.

dataFeedElement.name: Gungun Loses Her Cool
dataFeedElement.description: Gungun loses her cool when her mother annoys her friends at the party. Meanwhile, Chini and her family members engage in her wedding preparation.

dataFeedElement.name: Falgunan's Ploy
dataFeedElement.description: Nancy and Kalyani try hard to win the decency contest, while Falgunan and Kanakam attempt to push their buttons. Who will win the contest? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Heera is out of jail
dataFeedElement.description: Lekshmi asks Heera about Chinnu’s secret, but she refuses to answer. Heera promises that she will keep her word if Lekshmi gives her the duplicate key to the cell. Later, Heera manages to escape from jail. Will she give Lekshmi the information she is looking for?

dataFeedElement.name: Ashwini wants Runji to stay
dataFeedElement.description: Shruti is livid at Runji but Runji explains to her that Ashwini is mentally ill. Lalit is surprised to see Samyak's behaviour and decides to help him meet Shruti. Ashwini tells Runji to stay with her and Rishikesh.

dataFeedElement.name: The lucky actress
dataFeedElement.description: Modern Krishnan and sons wait for the actress at the hotel. They rejoice looking at the actress’s photographs. Deepthi notices Krishnan et al trying to sneak into the actress’s room. The lucky actress gets flowers from Krishnan and his sons along with flattering poetry!

dataFeedElement.name: Paresh Has a Plan
dataFeedElement.description: Anuradha sings a song associated to Kaushalya's past. On the account of Rabindra Jayanti, Paresh notifies the villagers that he will be directing a play.

dataFeedElement.name: A Shocker for Ujaan
dataFeedElement.description: Ujaan gets worried when he does not find Hiya in the hospital. Later, he receives a pleasant surprise. However, there is also some devastating news for him.

dataFeedElement.name: Supriya in Rage
dataFeedElement.description: Supriya lashes out at Vishvanath as Punya refuses to sell the house to Bhagwan. Elsewhere, Ajji wishes for Punya's well-being.

dataFeedElement.name: Rajlaxmi furious at Kanchanmala
dataFeedElement.description: Rupali wants to join the family business but Devaki refuses. Meanwhile, Kanchanmala visits Rajlaxmi’s house and offers help. But Rajlaxmi is livid with her and asks her to leave the house. Later, Rajlaxmi sees Kanchanmala doing something. What is she upto?

dataFeedElement.name: A Surprise for Irabati!
dataFeedElement.description: Irabati sings at the New Year’s party. Suddenly, the lights go out and Akash takes Irabati by surprise.

dataFeedElement.name: Sakthi takes out Meenatchi
dataFeedElement.description: Anbarasu is angry with the groom’s family for cancelling the marriage. Meenatchi asks Sakthi to take her out as she wants to talk to him. He is disheartened to realise she brought him out to talk to Anbarasu regarding his love.

dataFeedElement.name: Kanika cheats Rewa
dataFeedElement.description: The ambience of Aqua Pro Academy turns out to be soothing when Rewa receives an award for winning the swimming contest. Jai and Umang organise a party to celebrate her victory. However, a furious Kanika and her father conspire against Rewa, and get her disqualified.

dataFeedElement.name: Sarayu Apologises to Kalyani
dataFeedElement.description: Sarayu makes an unexpected gesture to thank Kalyani for her help. Later, Kalyani catches Kiran and Sarayu together.

dataFeedElement.name: Pratima Dreams Of Pooja
dataFeedElement.description: Thangam prays for her mother's release. Pratima wakes up dreaming about Pooja. Will she be able to find her? Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Suraj Seeks The Truth
dataFeedElement.description: Akash is relieved to find that Sagarika is safe. Determined to find the truth about Nitya, Suraj tags along Niharika's family for the wedding shopping. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Kumar Gets Thrashed
dataFeedElement.description: Lokai spots Kumar and informs Purbi that he has spotted Gobinda. Later, Dali thrashes Kumar after Lokai makes a shocking revelation. Watch the latest and full episodes of Bhojo Gobindo streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Bishakha's Ill Intentions
dataFeedElement.description: Param finds out that someone has swapped the saris. Bishakha pretends to be sick to prevent Topu-Tiya's first night. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Shivika's Shocking Discovery
dataFeedElement.description: Shivaay sends OmRu, Bhavya, Anika and Gauri back to the Oberoi Mansion but Anika returns to him. Soon, Shivika learn a shocking detail about Veer while the latter tricks Tej into signing a legal document. Watch the latest and full episodes of Ishqbaaaz streaming on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Kali Creates a Demon
dataFeedElement.description: Kusum and Ekadashi desperately try to save the villagers of Pandhari. Later, Vithal is worried as Kali conjures a demon named Kauravi to kill Pundalik.

dataFeedElement.name: Jaywant Slaps Rajlaxmi
dataFeedElement.description: Shweta takes advantage of Jaywant's condition and conspires against Rajlaxmi. Later, Jaywant slaps Rajlaxmi when he learns about the psychiatrist's visit to Sardeshmukh House.

dataFeedElement.name: Anurup to the Rescue?
dataFeedElement.description: The Ghoshs are stunned when Anurup reveals the reason behind his visit. Later, he agrees to help Ayandeep.

dataFeedElement.name: Automation Test Episode for API Test of replication update
dataFeedElement.description: This is an episode for API Automation test for replication of episode from one tenant to another

dataFeedElement.name: Savitha returns home
dataFeedElement.description: Zakir is not pleased with Agrima Singh's decision, but he trains Sandhya how to shoot. Sandhya gets into an argument with Zakir as he rebukes her during the training. Savitha returns home. Meenakshi tries to create problems for Mohan and Preethi's Goa trip by provoking Savitha.

dataFeedElement.name: Neel, Bhairavi Read Shreya's Note
dataFeedElement.description: Sumitra’s sons conspire against Neel along with Mr. Sarang. Neel and Bhairavi learn about a mysterious man from Shreya's secret note.

dataFeedElement.name: Lutfunissa Saves Siraj
dataFeedElement.description: Ghaseti gets furious when Lutfunissa spoils her plan to kill Siraj. Later, Siraj visits Lutfunissa in her chamber.

dataFeedElement.name: Insightful Astrology
dataFeedElement.description: Kanippayyoor Narayanan Namboothiri provides insight for people born under Pooradam, Uthradam, Vishakham and Karthika Nakshatras. Shaji Joseph gives valuable Vastu tips. Watch the full episode, online only on Hotstar.

dataFeedElement.name: Devi Spots Mayan at Hotel
dataFeedElement.description: Devi spots Mayan as a hotel waiter, when she goes out with her friend. Infuriated, she vows to make him suffer. Meanwhile, Aravind and Gowri insult Thamarai.
